page.title: 14A 9th BIRTHDAY IN CHURCHDOWN
page.content: My 9th Birthday was on July 6th 1985. I had lots of presents,they were a snooker table,some "Star Wars"figures, a tennis racquet,tennis ball and a shuttle-cock.I had a party at Winston Road Sports Hall.We had to wear training shoes so that we didn't damage the surface of the floor.The party started at 3:00p.m. and finished at 5:30p.m.. We played girls v boys football and netball.We also played"Kingball":one person from each team stands on a bench.The ball is then thrown to the person on the bench who is joined by a team-mate until the whole team is on the bench. We went home and had beefburgers and rolls for tea.I had a Birthday cake in the shape of a cricket pitch with fielders on it.I had a lovely day.
